Title: It's a 20-Fold Kaio-ken! A Kamehameha with Everything on the Line
Writer: Aya Matsui, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Plot: After suffering a savage beating at the hands of Frieza, Goku summons the awesome power of the Kaio-Ken! If his desperate attack succeeds, victory will be his, but if it fails, the Saiyan race will be eliminated!
